title: Zohynas got me suspended.
body: I got reported by a some people because I refused to zohynas and now Im suspended. I didn't realize Riot punished players for not buying items they dont like to use. Bring on the mob rule, its no longer about enjoying the game, its all about playing the meta. Thank you for this, I sure have learned my lesson.

replies.body: Riot does not issue bans due to an unwillingness to purchase a specific item. The more likely case is something in your chat log related to how you conveyed that unwillingness pushed you over a line. If you have your logs, we can help you identify what may have happened here, or whether this is one of the rare errors.

Correct, I got reported for grieving and inappropriate chat logs because in chat I refused to buy zoynhas and said I dont like using barrier. Which led to a brief suspension.

I wasn't banned, didn't say I was banned. I was suspended and put on chat restriction...because I dont like barrier and refused to buy zoyhnas.
Then post the chat logs. Otherwise include a picture of the reform card.

They don't. They give you penalties by Consistency and Severity.
So you did one of the following. But they certainly didn't ban you for that.

Riot don't hand out bans, players earn them.

i thought this is gonna be a joke thread ala "i used zhonyas and got a leaverbuster for it"
but no. the thread is just a joke.
They don't ban you because you didn't use a certain item.
I guarantee you there is no report category for 'did not buy zhonya's'.

You did not get banned for not buying Zhonya, and nobody believes you.
Man, just stop telling these obvious lies, it's boring.

If you want to prove this happened put in pictures of why did you get punished, and maybe a conversation with the support "bot" too :D
The clickbait titles get more creative by the day...

The fact that OP horribly misspelled Zhonya's twice in exactly the same way lead me to suspect this is just trolling.

OP, I invite you to prove me wrong, either by providing chat logs or information from the reform card.

It depends on your attitude during this event, as well as if you were doing it on purpose to give your team a shitty experience.
If its not one of those two, contact Rito bois
